parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly refers to the UDMR party and implicitly to its candidates by showcasing their team for Ilfov County.  The text "Poziția 4 pe buletinul de vot" (Position 4 on the ballot) directly indicates a specific party's placement on the ballot, thus influencing voters' choices.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The use of hashtags further amplifies its reach and targets a broader public.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to choose the UDMR party (position 4 on the ballot) in the Ilfov County elections. The visual presentation of the team and the slogans ("Alege vocea rațiunii! România pe primul loc!" - Choose the voice of reason! Romania in first place!) directly aim to influence voting behavior.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's promotional material, not a news report or analysis. The focus is on promoting a specific political party and its candidates, not on providing unbiased information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clearly partisan political advertisement promoting a specific party and its candidates.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>931203648367320</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by RMDSZ/UDMR, clearly constitutes electoral propaganda. It directly promotes the UDMR party and its candidates for the Ilfov County elections by displaying their team photo, emphasizing their position on the ballot ("Poziția 4 pe buletinul de vot"), and using slogans designed to sway voters ("Alege vocea rațiunii! România pe primul loc!").  The post's paid nature and broad reach on Facebook solidify its intention to influence the election outcome.  While the post does not explicitly mention individual candidates' names, the visual representation of the team and the clear call to vote for position 4 on the ballot are sufficient to qualify it as electoral propaganda.  The hashtags further enhance its reach and impact.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>UDMR Ilfov Candidates</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>UDMR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
RMDSZ/UDMR, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări (ID 931203648367320) cu caracter de propagandă electorală, care promovează explicit echipa UDMR pentru Ilfov, indicând poziția lor pe buletinul de vot ("Poziția 4 pe buletinul de vot") și utilizând slogane menite să influențeze votul ("Alege vocea rațiunii! România pe primul loc!").  Efectul electoral al acestei postări este clar, având ca obiectiv influențarea votului în favoarea UDMR.  Postarea, fiind plătită și având o vizibilitate extinsă pe Facebook, întrunește toate criteriile pentru a fi considerată propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
